name: Application Developer Intern
description: Developed features for a web banking application built on Angular, RxJS, SCSS, and Bootstrap utility classes.
Collaborated in an Agile environment for sprint planning, task management, and daily stand-ups.
Partnered with product owners and UX designers to deliver components that matched business requirements and upheld design standards.
Found design patterns for components and services that can be reused in features across the application
Contributed to code reviews, testing, and documentation.
Created and maintained unit tests written with Jest to ensure code quality and reliability.
Translated Figma UX designs from the design team into responsive, accessible UI components.
